mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER"( ORDER_NO, ORDER_CLASS_NO, ORDER_CLASS_AMOUNT, ORDER_CURRENCY, ORDER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{orderClassNo}, #{orderClassAmount}, #{orderCurrency}, #{orderMemberNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO AS orderNo, ORDER_CLASS_AMOUNT AS orderClassAmount, MEMBER_NAME AS customerName, TITLE FROM "ORDER" JOIN "BOARD" ON BOARD_NO = ORDER_CLASS_NO JOIN "MEMBER" ON MEMBER_NO = ORDER_MEMBER_NO WHERE ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}
